name: Mankojai
description:
The Mankojai live far behind on a small island.

They like to move around together.

What adventure is there to master today? 

Please help them with this . . .

* * *

You can control them with the arrow keys.

With the Space key you can stop the background music.

* * *

This game is written in Rust
with the help of the Tetra game engine.

* * *

If anyone wonders why this game looks so old then it's because it was created for the NOKIA 3310 Jam.

v0.1.1

  • smaller music file
  • you can now also play with a controler (xbox tested)
